page.title: 11 Nanny's Rock
page.content: Nanny's Rock is quite hard to find in the bushes & undergrowth of Kinver Edge.It consists of sandstone.There are five sandstone rooms with windows.The rock got its name from a woman who li- ved there.The chimney called'Devils chimney'goes up the side of the rock. There are lots of tales about Nanny's Rock including'Bladys of the Stewpony '.Also many highwaymen have used the cave for a hiding place.Our only information about Nanny is that of actress Nancy Price who would visit Nanny in the cave while she was making herbs & potions.She was the only person brave enough to visit Nanny.Then finaly Nanny disappeared & was never seen again.The story of Nanny might not be true but there is an entery of Margaret -of-the fox earth in the parish register.
